intro: This is the main content of the website.

hero.kicker: Custom AI operations · built for you by Primex
hero.body: We design custom AI agents that connect to your ERP, product data, logistics, and service workflows — built on 40+ years of operational know-how.
hero.statsText: From 90-minute claim cases to 70-second automated resolutions — without extra headcount.
hero.rightBody: We co-design every agent with your teams, so each workflow stays compliant with your ERP, marketplaces, and service SLAs.

highlights.title: Product data ops
highlights.description: Normalize SKUs, enrich attributes, and sync content to marketplaces in real time.

highlights.title: Claims automation
highlights.description: Read emails, analyze photos/PDFs, and close tickets directly in your ERP.

highlights.title: Logistics & service
highlights.description: Track shipments, trigger spare parts, and keep customers updated 24/7.

partnersGrid.title: Built for the furniture industry, adaptable everywhere
partnersGrid.body: We work inside the furniture supply chain—yet our AI agents also adapt to logistics, retail tech, manufacturing, and any workflow that mirrors the same operational rigor.

about.mainTitle: From Family Tradition to an AI Leader in the Furniture Industry
about.intro: With over 40 years of family experience, PRIMEX bridges tradition and modern technology, leading the digital transformation in the furniture industry for the DACH region and beyond.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: PRIMEX is a company from Kosovo offering complete Backoffice services for the furniture and retail industry. For over a decade, we have been a trusted partner for major companies in Germany, Austria, and Switzerland, supporting both traditional stores and online platforms.

aiEvolution.title: From Manual Services to Artificial Intelligence
aiEvolution.description: The world of furniture is changing. Old systems and manual processes are slowing the industry down. PRIMEX turned this challenge into an opportunity, creating one of Europe's most advanced innovations.

aiAgent.title: AI Agent for Complaints – 70 Seconds
aiAgent.subtitle: Where a human spends 60–90 minutes, our AI completes the process in 70 seconds. This is the transformation redesigning the industry standard.

visionMission.title: Our Vision & Mission
visionMission.description: We see the future as a combination of human knowledge and artificial intelligence. Our mission is to help companies optimize processes, increase efficiency, and build a competitive advantage in the European market.

services.intro: Tailored solutions designed to optimize your business operations and support your growth.

items.title: AI Agents for Operations
items.description: We blueprint, train, and operate AI agents that automate claims, product data, logistics and service workflows—safeguarded with human-in-the-loop oversight and 40+ years of furniture know-how.

items.title: Software Developer & IT Support
items.description: We deliver tailored software solutions and integrate virtual agents that support tasks such as order processing, customer service, logistics, and data management. Our team also ensures data protection concepts and strong cyber-security measures.

items.title: Graphic Designer
items.description: Our experienced design team creates high-quality and visually stunning designs that exceed expectations. We focus on creativity, precision, and fast turnaround times. Whether you need branding, web design, or marketing materials, we deliver results tailored to your vision.

items.title: Assistant Administrator
items.description: Our administrative services streamline your daily operations—conducting research, preparing reports, managing communications, and coordinating schedules. We ensure that essential administrative tasks are handled efficiently and professionally.

items.title: Sales & Bookkeeping
items.description: PrimEx provides global wholesale and retail sales management, production planning, logistics coordination, and advanced e-commerce solutions for B2B and B2C. Our bookkeeping services include accurate transaction recording, financial reporting, and compliance with accounting standards to ensure smooth financial operations.

items.title: E-Commerce
items.description: Our skilled developers build customized e-commerce websites that effectively promote your brand. We focus on tailored solutions that strengthen your online presence and drive continuous business growth.

joinBusiness.joinDescription: Become part of our growing team and build your future with us.
joinBusiness.businessDescription: Tell us what you want to build. We help companies scale with modern digital solutions.

testimonials.quote: We built Cotopaxi with Shopify from day one.
